metadata.title: CVE-2024-40946 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:hid: asus: asus_report_fixup: fix potential read out of boundssyzbot reported a potential read out of bounds in asus_report_fixup.this patch adds checks so that a read out of bounds will not occur

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
